Description: Title:KBR is a global provider of differentiated professional services and technologies across the asset and program life cycle within the Government Services and Hydrocarbons sectors. KBR employs approximately 34,000 people worldwide (including our joint ventures), with customers in more than 80 countries, and operations in 40 countriesJob RequirementSpecialist Project Control with Offshore/Onshore experience to be based in Abu Dhabi for PMC/EPC project.Experience required:We Value Our People –We Deliver –We Are People of Integrity –We Empower –We Are a Team of Teams –Job Details
